abilities.title: We've got a big problem...
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose an Active objective. One character in this Unit may Toward the chosen objective. Then choose an enemy character within 3 that is contesting the chosen objective, if able. The chosen character gains [exposed]. Defensive maneuver Each character in this Unit may .If any characters , this unit gains . Say goodnight, clankers! Characters in this unit have SHARPSHOOTER [2]. When a character in this unit makes a attack, the target does not benefit from cover . Bring it down! When an allied Clone trooper supporting character within 4 that has a one or more making a attack as part of a combat action, it may reroll up to two of its results.
